welcome_benefits: 100% Cashback Upto ₹500 (On First UPI Transactions Within 15 Days) - LIMITED TIME OFFER

product_details: The FIRST EA₹N Credit Card is a Fixed Deposit-backed credit card.
With this card, customers can earn 1% cashback on all UPI spends made with the IDFC app.
Earn 0.5% cashback on select categories like insurance, wallet, and utilities.
Get a 25% discount upto ₹100 while booking movies with District by Zomato.
